      • create

        public static RoleValidator.RoleConfig create​(Config config)
        Will read roles allowed from configuration. Format (yaml): 
         roles-allowed:
  user: ["role1","role2"]
  service: ["role3]
        Parameters:
        config - configuration located on key "roles-allowed"
        Returns:
        roles config for the configuration
